text:
At the lowest level, if you have a CSS file that sets your global styles, then making your subscription page look like the rest of your site should be a matter of attaching that stylesheet in the design manager to your subscription page.

With that said, everything that you can do to customize the subscription page is done in the Design Tools. So if you wanted to change the layout, you would need to use the editor to move/arrange sections and coding could be necessary for the client depending on what has been established.
This helps a lot. Thank you!
